themes: lack of transparency in grant process
grant evaluation criteria unrelated to artistic merit
perceived unfairness in prioritizing disadvantaged applicants
frustration with grant reviewers not engaging with submitted work
key_phrases: questions you lost points were what part of Austin do you live in, do you have bank account
did you'll even listen to my music on the grant review I requested and the person said NO
they just wanted the poorest or more disadvantaged artist to get grants and that is Wrong
barriers_identified: grant criteria not based on artistic merit
reviewers not listening to submitted work
focus on applicants' economic status over talent
